title: The Magistrates
brief_description: A re-enactment of parts of a typical Monday morning’s proceedings of a city magistrates’ court in New South Wales (called Petty Sessions in that State). Also includes visits and extensive interviews with justices and lawyers about New South Wales county court system and justice system. Presented by Gerald Stone.
